name: Chessface
description:
Rundown

Use six traditional chess pieces to eliminate the enemy team, but watch out, your pieces are randomized every 3 turns using a 6-sided die! Instead of pips, each side of the die is a chess piece.

Lucky for you, you can change the odds: every time you take an enemy piece, you can replace a side of the die with it! That means if you took 6 bishops, you'd eventually have a whole team of bishops!

Beat all 6 levels to win a run.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Known Bugs

Unfortunately, a couple of pretty severe bugs slipped by me:

-Sometimes player pieces will overlap enemy pieces, instead of taking.

-Sometimes enemies will "hop" over pieces like a Knight, when they shouldn't.
